snippet: The Pentagon said late Saturday that it is investigating why a Navy submarine collided with an Aegis cruiser during routine operations at an undisclosed location.
lead_paragraph: The Pentagon said late Saturday that it is investigating why a Navy submarine collided with an Aegis cruiser during routine operations at an undisclosed location.

headline.seo: Submarine Montpelier Collides With Aegis Cruiser San Jacinto

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
